00027 
00042 
00043 BrachistochroneProblem::BrachistochroneProblem(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron)
00044 : ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)
00045 {
00046    // Control sentence
00047 
00048    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00049    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00050 
00051    if(numberOfInputs != 1 || numberOfOutputs != 1)
00052    {
00053       std::cerr << std::endl
00054                 << "Flood Error: BrachistochroneProblem class." << std::endl
00055                 << "BrachistochroneProblem(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00056                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be 1." << std::endl
00057                 << std::endl;
00058 
00059       exit(1);
00060    }
00061 
00062    xA = 0.0;
00063    yA = 1.0;
00064    xB = 1.0;
00065    yB = 0.0;
00066 
00067    // This problem is very sensitive to this parameter!
00068    tolerance = 1.0e-6;
00069    initialSize = 1000;
00070 
00071    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setTolerance(tolerance);
00072    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setInitialSize(initialSize);
00073 }
00074

00092 {
00093    xA = 0.0;
00094    yA = 1.0;
00095    xB = 1.0;
00096    yB = 0.0;
00097 
00098    // This problem is very sensitive to this parameter!!!
00099    tolerance = 1.0e-6;
00100    initialSize = 1000000;
00101 }

00240 
00241 void BrachistochroneProblem::setTolerance(double newTolerance)
00242 {
00243    // Control sentence
00244 
00245    if(newTolerance <= 0.0)
00246    {
00247       std::cerr << std::endl
00248                 << "Flood Error: BrachistochroneProblem class." << std::endl
00249                 << "void setTolerance(double) method." << std::endl
00250                 << "Tolerance must be greater than 0." << std::endl
00251                 << std::endl;
00252 
00253       exit(1);
00254    }
00255 
00256    // Set tolerance
00257 
00258    tolerance = newTolerance;
00259 
00260    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setTolerance(tolerance);
00261 }

00284 {
00285    xA = newXa;
00286    yA = newYa;
00287    xB = newXb;
00288    yB = newYb;

00292 // Vector<double> calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double>)
00293 
00303 
00304 Vector<double> BrachistochroneProblem::calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double> input)
00305 {
00306    // Control sentence
00307 
00308    int size = input.getSize();
00309 
00310    if(size != 1)
00311    {
00312       std::cerr << std::endl
00313                 << "Flood Error: BrachistochroneProblem class." << std::endl
00314                 << "Vector<double> calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double>)." << std::endl
00315                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00316                 << std::endl;
00317 
00318       exit(1);
00319    }
00320 
00321    // Calculate particular solution
00322 
00323    Vector<double> particularSolution(1);
00324 
00325    double x = input[0];
00326 
00327    particularSolution[0] = yA + (yB-yA)*(x-xA)/(xB-xA);
00328 
00329    return(particularSolution);
00330 }

00333 // Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double>)
00334 
00344 
00345 Vector<double> BrachistochroneProblem::calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double> input)
00346 {
00347    // Control sentence
00348 
00349    int size = input.getSize();
00350 
00351    if(size != 1)
00352    {
00353       std::cerr << std::endl
00354                 << "Flood Error: BrachistochroneProblem class." << std::endl
00355                 << "Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double>)." << std::endl
00356                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00357                 << std::endl;
00358 
00359       exit(1);
00360    }
00361 
00362    // Calculate homogeneous solution
00363 
00364    Vector<double> homogeneousSolution(1);
00365 
00366    double x = input[0];
00367 
00368    homogeneousSolution[0] = (x-xA)*(x-xB);
00369 
00370    return(homogeneousSolution);
00371 }

00375 
00384 
00385 Vector<double> BrachistochroneProblem::calculateParticularSolutionDerivative(Vector<double> input)
00386 {
00387    // Control sentence
00388 
00389    int size = input.getSize();
00390 
00391    if(size != 1)
00392    {
00393       std::cerr << std::endl
00394                 << "Flood Error: BrachistochroneProblem class." << std::endl
00395                 << "Vector<double> calculateParticularSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>)." << std::endl
00396                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00397                 << std::endl;
00398 
00399       exit(1);
00400    }
00401 
00402    // Calculate particular solution derivative
00403 
00404    Vector<double> particularSolutionDerivative(1);
00405 
00406    particularSolutionDerivative[0] = (yB-yA)/(xB-xA);
00407 
00408    return(particularSolutionDerivative);
00409 }

00412 // Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>)
00413 
00422 
00423 Vector<double> BrachistochroneProblem::calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(Vector<double> input)
00424 {
00425    // Control sentence
00426 
00427    int size = input.getSize();
00428 
00429    if(size != 1)
00430    {
00431       std::cerr << std::endl
00432                 << "Flood Error: BrachistochroneProblem class." << std::endl
00433                 << "Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>)." << std::endl
00434                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00435                 << std::endl;
00436 
00437       exit(1);
00438    }
00439 
00440    // Calculate homogeneous solution derivative
00441 
00442    Vector<double> homogeneousSolutionDerivative(1);
00443 
00444    double x = input[0];
00445 
00446    homogeneousSolutionDerivative[0] = (x-xA) + (x-xB);
00447 
00448    return(homogeneousSolutionDerivative);
00449 }

00452 // double calculateDescentTimeIntegrand(double, double) method
00453 
00460 
00461 double BrachistochroneProblem::calculateDescentTimeIntegrand(double x, double dummy)
00462 {
00463    double descentTimeIntegrand = 0.0;
00464 
00465    Vector<double> input(1, x);
00466 
00467 
00468    Vector<double> output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input, *this);
00469 
00470    double y = output[0];
00471 
00472    Matrix<double> jacobian = multilayerPerceptron->calculateJacobian(input, *this);
00473 
00474    double dydt = jacobian[0][0];
00475 
00476    // This problem is very sensitive to this parameter!
00477 
00478    double small = 1.0e-6;
00479 
00480    if(y >= yA)
00481    {
00482       y = yA - small;
00483       dydt = 0.0;
00484    }
00485 
00486    // Get descent time integrand
00487 
00488    double numerator = 1.0 + pow(dydt,2);
00489    double denominator = yA-y;
00490 
00491    descentTimeIntegrand = sqrt(numerator/denominator);
00492    
00493    return(descentTimeIntegrand);   
00494 }
00495 
00496 
00497 // double calculateDescentTime(void) method
00498 
00504 
00505 double BrachistochroneProblem::calculateDescentTime(void)      
00506 {
00507    double descentTime = 0.0;
00508 
00509    double const g = 9.81;
00510 
00511    Vector<double> x;
00512    Vector<double> y;     
00513 
00514    // This problem is very sensitive to this parameter!
00515    double small = 1.0e-6;
00516 
00517    int numberOfPoints = 
00518    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(*this, x, y, 
00519    &BrachistochroneProblem::calculateDescentTimeIntegrand,
00520    xA+small, xB, 0.0);
00521 
00522    double integral = y[numberOfPoints-1];
00523 
00524    descentTime = integral/sqrt(2.0*g);
00525 
00526    return(descentTime);   
00527 }

00530 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00531 
00535 
00536 double BrachistochroneProblem::calculateEvaluation()
00537 {
00538     // Control sentence 
00539 
00540    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00541    {
00542       std::cerr << std::endl
00543                 << "Flood Error: BrachistochroneProblem class." << std::endl
00544                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00545                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00546                 << std::endl;
00547       
00548       exit(1);
00549    }
00550 
00551 
00552    // Increment number of objective evaluations
00553 
00554    numberOfEvaluations++;
00555 
00556    // Evaluate objective functional 
00557 
00558    double descentTime = calculateDescentTime();   
00559 
00560    double evaluation = descentTime;
00561 
00562    return(evaluation);
00563 }

00566 // void save(char*) method
00567 
00577 
00578 void BrachistochroneProblem::saveResults(char* filename)
00579 {
00580    std::fstream file; 
00581 
00582    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00583 
00584    if(!file.is_open())
00585    {
00586       std::cout << std::endl
00587                 << "Cannot open brachistochrone problem results data file."  
00588                 << std::endl << std::endl;
00589 
00590       exit(1);
00591    }
00592    else
00593    {
00594       if(display)
00595      {
00596          std::cout << std::endl
00597                    << "Saving brachistochrone problem results to data file..." << std::endl;
00598      }
00599    }
00600 
00601    // File header
00602 
00603    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Brachistochrone problem results data file." << std::endl
00604         << "% Column data:" << std::endl
00605         << "%  1 - Independent variable (x)" << std::endl
00606         << "%  2 - Dependent variable (y)" << std::endl
00607         << std::endl;
00608 
00609    // File data
00610 
00611    Vector<double> input(1);
00612    Vector<double> output(1);
00613 
00614    double x = 0.0;
00615    double y = 0.0;
00616    
00617    int numberOfPoints = 101;
00618 
00619    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00620    {
00621       // Obtain x
00622 
00623       x = xA + (xB - xA)*i/(numberOfPoints-1.0);
00624 
00625       // Obtain y[i]
00626 
00627       input[0] = x;
00628 
00629       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input, *this);
00630 
00631       y = output[0];
00632       
00633       // Write x and y to file
00634 
00635       file << x << " " << y << std::endl;   
00636    }
00637 
00638    file.close();
00639 }
